Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: The number of generative passes. Higher numbers create more complexity, but may take a bit more time to generate.

Flub.Name: Poisson
Flub.Description: Seemingly random placement with a natural pattern.

Flub.Name: Grid
Flub.Description: Grid placement in strict columns and rows.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
